description: This Java source file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to file APIs within the invoice backend system, specifically a class containing a nested class for file upload responses.

classes.name: FileDtos
classes.description: A container class for DTOs related to file operations, serving as a namespace for nested DTO classes.

classes.name: FileUploadResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the response details after a file upload, including attributes like attachment id, filename, MIME type, size, invoice id, and partner id.
